entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Vauxhall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:43 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vauxhall AAFC 02:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Fog dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 8:35 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 8:35 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
